      • publish

        Specified by:

        public void publishAll()
        Publish ALL of a chain to refresh. This will create the links based on the elements in elementList.
        Specified by:
        publishAll in interface MdsOmPubChain

      • publishOneAll

        public void publishOneAll()
        Description copied from interface: MdsOmPubChain
        Publish the entire chain. This method and PublishTwo are used only if the app wants to add additional fields to the link msgs. See the MdsOmChain sample app for usage.
        Specified by:
        publishOneAll in interface MdsOmPubChain

      • publishOne

        public void publishOne()
        This is only used by an app that wants to add extra fields. To do that call PublishOne(), the get the MamaMsg and add fields, and then call PublishTwo().
        Specified by:
        publishOne in interface MdsOmPubChain

      • publishTwo

        public void publishTwo()
        Description copied from interface: MdsOmPubChain
        Publish the chain. This method and PublishTwo are used only if the app wants to add additional fields to the link msgs. See the MdsOmChain sample app for usage.
        Specified by:
        publishTwo in interface MdsOmPubChain
